TEXT.S:
kakiliman Lu-i.ya-ke.mang-tay.Ta-kay-al "kamu nu Ba, Louis-Jacques-Mandé Daguerre, 1787 a mihca 11 a bulad 18 a demiad-1851 a mihca 7 a bulad 10 a demiad" lecuh i Ba-kow-wa-le-te-wa-ce-sen-pa-li-si a kitizaan a Ke-al-mey-ye "Ba a kamu, Cormeilles-en-Parisis" mapatay i capi nu Pa-li, u mutesakay nu nisanga'an mutesekay nu kucungay atu mutesakay nu hwa-sye. na u mutesekay nu mikulitay tu hekal nu paazihan, zikuz nisanga'an tu Ta-kay-al a ing-pan-ba, singangan aca tu Ta-kay-al a pisasing. 1839 a mihca 8 a bulad 19 a demiad Hwa-kow ke-sye atu kucungay sye-yen micakay tu teked a sapisasing, patahkal musakamu tu hekalay, pakatineng izaw tu ku sapisasing. ···:Louis-Jacques-Mandé Daguerre17871118-1851710:Cormeilles-en-Parisis1839819
nilaculan nikauzipan Ta-kay-al naminanam patizeng, miseyki tu paigian atu nikulitan hamin ku hekal, i paazihan a singangan ku nikulutan. misanga' tu malikatay pangisulay maazih ku kasahiza i 1822 a mihca 7 a bulad i Pa-li malingatu paazih. 1827 a micaan ci Ni-ay-pu-s misanga' tu nu kitakitay saayaway u tahazikau nu matenesay a sasing "u likat nu cilal ku palahedaway tu sasing". tusa a mihcaan zikuz makakadum ci Ta-kay-al aci Ni-ay-pu-s, malingatu tatusa tu sakay sepat a mihcaan a kakadum. 1833 a mihcaan bahal mapatay ci Ni-ay-pu-s. 182271827""1833 ci Ni-ay-pu-s aci Ta-al-kay a kakadum angangan a lalekalan a miliyung cinizaan tu nisanga'an pangasu maazih ku nikulitan a pakala tu kapahay a ngangan. ci Ni-ay-pu-s u miin-swaay a sayhu, nalimaan niza u kalamkamay a izaw ku in-swa-pan. ci Ta-kay-al pitapal makaawas tu nalimaan ni Ni-ay-pu-s taneng misakalamkam ciniza tu kaizaw nu pikulit tu pangasutay maazih.
1839 a nihcaan Ta-kay-al musakamu ci Ta-kay-al tu pisasing pakal tu maedem ku kalaheci. lecad a mihca1 a bulad 9 a demiad Ba-kow ke-sye-yen i zyasian malecaday a musakamu. Ba-kow cen-hu pasay Ta-kay-al tekeday a sapicakay, lecad a mihca 8 a bulad 19 a demiad Ba-kow cen-hu musakamu uyni a nisanga' u sakay "cayay paacaen pabeli tu kitakit" a sinubu. 183919819""
ci Ta-kay-al makay cen-hu pakala tu balakiay a sapahabay a kalisiw, nika ci Ni-ay-pu-s a iluc caay pakaala. sazikuzay Ni-ay-pu-s tatamaan a wawa mikusu tu cen-bu pakala aca tu cacay balakiay tu a sapahabay a kalisiw a tayni pakatineng tu kasingangan nu ama niza. Ta-kay-al kabatad tu Pa-li 12 kung-liay a Ma-en a sa'wac i lilis nu sa'wac a Pu-li "kamu nu Ba, Bry-sur-Marne" mapatay, tademan izaw ku cacay pikiningan a paya. Namahi uyza Ay-bey-al-tye-taay a nitu'tu'an tu 72 a kasilac. 12:Bry-sur-Marne72
Wi-lyen.Bu-ke-s.Ta-al-po-te a kadademec i Ta-kay-al pigingkiwan tu sapisasing namahiza ci Wi-lyen.Bu-ke-s.Ta-al-po-te i Ing-kow tatungus migingkiw tu ka-low-ba. tatusa siwantan tu ku pikawaw nuheni tu sakay nalimaan a kitakit similaangay. tawya dengadengay a "Ow-co-Ta-lu a liwku" zyasiay sipaina tu nikulitan a pal, gizice misasing caay ku taneng patakalaw a kakapah ku sasing, asaca salihalay tu kakapah nu pihibangan zazatengen mala ayzaay a sasing. ··sakay midiput tu nisanga'an niza, ci Ta-kay-al i 1839 a mihca 8 a bulad 12 a demiad misinsi tu nu Ing-kow tekeday a situngus "uyza i Ba-kow musakamu tuynian a nalimaad, "cayay paacaen pabeli tu kitakit tu ayaw cacay a lipay. uyni a kawaw mahaymaw tu ku pisasing a nilimaan i Ing-koway nipalahad. Ing-kow u cacayay i kitikat midiputay kuyni tekeday a tungus. i Ing-kow taneng tatungus tu hulic amicukaymas tu Ta-kay-al a misasing a gizice caay kakatuud ku tademaw, u zuma ci An-to-wan.Ke-law-te-te. 1839812""· mahizaay ni Ta-kay-al nipisasing a tademaw. mihiniay tademaway a sasing a pinaay tatukian kya malepun a masasing, masasingay a tademaw kanca la'cus misaungay. macekuk ci Sa-myaw-al.Mu-al-s makazih ku Pa-liay zazanay a pasasing Ta-kay-al i pisasingan inayi' ku cacacay a tademaw, katukuh amatineng kuyni zayhan tanaya' tatu ku nipalikat, namahiza caay kaazih nu mikawaway a tademaw. zikuz micukaymas tu kadadawaay tangah nu dadingu tadeng aapuyu' ku tatukia ku nipalikat. · kanahatu Ta-kay-al a pisasing caay ku tudungan "uyza u sapisasing sakay uyaanay a sapad muliyaw aca misasing", micukaymas amin ku tademaw tu ni Ta-kay-al a sapisasing masasing tu ku cacay lasubu a sassing. 1851 a mihcaan, kapatayan ni Ta-kay-al a mihcaan, 1851 a mihcaan nikaawas tu malahemeday a sapad Ke-low-tin a kawaw Ta-al-pow-teay a pisasing tabaki ku nikasumad, galasu a bu-pan taneng palalecad a misanga' tu yadahay mahapinangay a sasing. uyni palahad ci Ta-kay-al tu sapisasing kalamkam malakui't malawpes tu. 1851
malalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan : ·
